subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Rajasthan at Current Market Prices for the year 2020?
question_hi: राजस्थान के वर्ष 2020 के मॉर्टर सेक्टर्म प्रतिवर्षीय विकास (GDP) क्या है?
explanation_en: According to data from the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the GDP of Rajasthan at Current Market Prices for the year 2020 is Rs. 4,46,951 crore. (Source: https://mospi.nic.in/showfile.aspx?filename=State%20GDP%20at%20Current%20Market%20Prices.pdf)
